title: Mael Astruc--Le Souder
text:
I am a PhD student in Economics working primarily on migration and labor economics at the Bordeaux School of Economics (University of Bordeaux) under the supervision of Olivier Bargain and Isabelle Chort.
I am visiting the University Carlos III of Madrid from January to June 2025 with Jan Stuhler.

Return migration and natives labor market outcomes. With Cem Özgüzel and Benjamin Michallet
A Question of Honor? The Labor Market Advantage of Academic Signaling. With Olivier Bargain and Gedeão Locks
How Everyday Threats Undermine Trust and Hope: Experimental Evidence. With Olivier Bargain and Niclas Knecht

Return migration and natives labor market outcomes. With Cem Özgüzel and Benjamin Michallet
A Question of Honor? The Labor Market Advantage of Academic Signaling. With Olivier Bargain and Gedeão Locks
How Everyday Threats Undermine Trust and Hope: Experimental Evidence. With Olivier Bargain and Niclas Knecht

Non peer-reviewed
Astruc–Le Souder, M., Hesse, J., Hoffmann, C., Kleine-Rueschkamp, L., & Özgüzel, C. (2024). The OECD municipal migration database: Going granular (OECD Regional Development Papers 96). https://doi.org/10.1787/a79b007d-en

Contributions
OECD. (2022). The contribution of migration to regional development [OECD Regional Development Studies]. OECD Publishing. https://doi.org/10.1787/57046df4-en

Melki, M., Rapoport, H., Spolaore, E., & Wacziarg, R. (2024). Cultural remittances and modern fertility. National Bureau of Economic Research. https://doi.org/10.3386/w32990
